urlText: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17
content:
From 18 May 2020 there will be changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.

Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work will move from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps will be built to connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17

urlText: Fairy Meadow Station ramp access temporarily unavailable
content:
From Monday 10 August for approximately 10 weeks, there will be ‘stair access only’ to/from platform 1 at Fairy Meadow Station due to station upgrade works. Ramp access will not be available during this time.

Construction includes the building of new ramps and link bridges.

If you require ramp access you will be need to make alternative arrangements. 

For assistance please call Fairy Meadow Station on 02 4223 5582.
subtitle: Fairy Meadow Station ramp access temporarily unavailable

urlText: Central Station: Suburban Tunnel temporarily closed
content:
The Suburban Tunnel is temporarily closed for Sydney Metro construction works.

Access for Platforms 16 to 23 is only via the Northern Concourse or Southern Tunnel. View a map of Central station.
subtitle: Central Station: Suburban Tunnel temporarily closed

urlText: Central Station: Changes to Platforms 20 and 21
content:
From Monday 11 October, there are changes to Platforms 20 and 21 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.

Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff. If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 20 and 21, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage. For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Changes to Platforms 20 and 21

urlText: Central Station: Southern Concourse temporary closure
content:
From 17 October the Southern Concourse at Central Station will be temporarily closed for Sydney Metro works.

To access platforms 4 to 12 travel via the Northern Concourse.

See a map and other information about Central Station

For more information about Sydney Metro works visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Southern Concourse temporary closure

urlText: Central escalator outage (no. 1/2/3/4) between platforms 24/25 and concourse
content: From 18 October to mid-December 2020, the north escalator from the concourse to Platforms 24 and 25 (Town Hall end) will be temporarily closed for maintenance works. To access platforms 24 and 25 travel down the concourse to the lift or use the south escalator to Platforms 24 and 25 (Redfern end). You can view a map of the station here https://transportnsw.info/document/4930/central-station-map.pdf. If you need assistance, see station staff or call 9379 1777.
subtitle: Central escalator outage (no. 1/2/3/4) between platforms 24/25 and concourse

urlText: Central Station lift and escalator closure between Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse
content:
From 10pm Friday 16 to 4am Monday 19 October, the escalators and lift between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works. Alternative stairs, escalators and lift are available outside the Opal gates. Please follow the signs and staff directions.

If you need assistance, see station staff. For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info
subtitle: Central Station lift and escalator closure between Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse

urlText: Hornsby lift outage between platform 4/5 and concourse
content: The lift between the concourse and platforms 4 & 5 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, ask staff or call 9847 8428.
subtitle: Hornsby lift outage between platform 4/5 and concourse
